languages.text: {n}В воксе слышен шелестящий смех.{/n} "Посмотрим, будешь ли ты так{mf|им|ой} же дерзк{mf|им|ой}, когда мои макропушки наделают в твоем корабле дыр".
{n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still feeling so insolent after my macro-cannons make a few holes in your ship."
languages.original_text: {n}В воксе слышен шелестящий смех.{/n} "Посмотрим, будешь ли ты так{mf|им|ой} же дерзк{mf|им|ой}, когда мои макропушки наделают в твоем корабле дыр".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still so insolent after my macro-cannons have made a few holes in your ship."
{n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still so insolent after my macro-cannons have made a few holes in your ship."

{n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still feeling so insolent after my macro-cannons make a few holes in your ship."

languages.text: {n}El voco transmite una carcajada seca.{/n} «Veremos si sigues siendo tan insolente cuando mis macrocañones abran unos boquetes en tu nave».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still feeling so insolent after my macro-cannons make a few holes in your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco transmite una carcajada seca.{/n} «Veremos si sigues siendo tan insolente cuando mis macrocañones abran unos boquetes en tu nave».

languages.text: {n}音阵装置中传来了嘶哑的笑声。{/n}“等我的宏炮把你的船砸出几个大洞之后，再来我看看你的傲慢劲儿吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still feeling so insolent after my macro-cannons make a few holes in your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置中传来了嘶哑的笑声。{/n}“等我的宏炮把你的船砸出几个大洞之后，再来我看看你的傲慢劲儿吧。”

languages.text: {n}Le vox émet un rire chuintant.{/n} « On verra bien si vous êtes toujours aussi {mf|sûr|sûre} de vous quand mes macro-canons auront percé quelques trous dans votre vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still feeling so insolent after my macro-cannons make a few holes in your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox émet un rire chuintant.{/n} « On verra bien si vous êtes toujours aussi {mf|sûr|sûre} de vous quand mes macro-canons auront percé quelques trous dans votre vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}ヴォックスからカサカサと笑い声が聞こえる。{/n}「私のマクロキャノンがお前の船にいくつかの穴を開けた後でも、まだその偉そうな態度でいられるか見てみようじゃないか」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still feeling so insolent after my macro-cannons make a few holes in your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォックスからカサカサと笑い声が聞こえる。{/n}「私のマクロキャノンがお前の船にいくつかの穴を開けた後でも、まだその偉そうな態度でいられるか見てみようじゃないか」

languages.text: {n}Vokstan hışırtılı kahkahalar duyuluyor.{/n} "Makro toplarım geminde birkaç delik açtıktan sonra da böyle küstahça konuşabilecek misin göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still feeling so insolent after my macro-cannons make a few holes in your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vokstan hışırtılı kahkahalar duyuluyor.{/n} "Makro toplarım geminde birkaç delik açtıktan sonra da böyle küstahça konuşabilecek misin göreceğiz."

languages.text: {n}Aus dem Vox ertönt ein rasselndes Lachen.{/n} "Mal sehen, ob Ihr immer noch so überheblich seid, nachdem meine Makrokanonen einige Löcher in Euer Schiff geschossen haben."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox produces rustling laughter.{/n} "We'll see if you are still feeling so insolent after my macro-cannons make a few holes in your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus dem Vox ertönt ein rasselndes Lachen.{/n} "Mal sehen, ob Ihr immer noch so überheblich seid, nachdem meine Makrokanonen einige Löcher in Euer Schiff geschossen haben."
